Name: Primal Surge
Story Background: In the heart of the ancient forest, where the primal forces converge, a surge of raw mana burst forth, shaping reality itself.
Ability: Target player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws that many cards. They may play an additional land this turn.
Appearance Description: The card art depicts a torrent of vibrant green energy erupting from the ground, twisting and shaping the natural surroundings.
